description:
The song is in standard D, not drop D.
Added some slides to the main riff, chorus riff, and in the breakdown part.
The chorus riff is straight single 32nd notes, no power chords or other rhythm.
There are some pauses before the choruses where they just hold the E5. 
Breakdown riff had missing palm mutes.
Right before the chorus riff during the solo riff, It sounds like there is another pause but they play an open D note right before it goes into the chorus.
----
Westerband LOVES Nailbomb
title: Wasting Away
